ygData.subject: Argument on Warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually it all depends how you look at it. About the only class that really isn t balanced are the rogues. Spell Casters have a big hope in the fact that they
ygData.messageBody: Actually it all depends how you look at it. About the only class that really isn't balanced are the rogues. Spell Casters have a big hope in the fact that they can take stuff down quickly but I've played a warrior and a Necromancer and I'm telling you warriors can level the fastest of all classes. I do agree with the idea that Spell Casters should do more damage then a warrior it's the way every RPG has always been at least through the games I've played. However I think warriors should be the king of melee which currently they are no better then a SK, Paladin, or a Ranger. Anyway I think a 5-10 damage increase in combat would make a huge diffrence if only for warriors.
